story.text: VANCOUVER, British Columbia Jan 3 Canada's Encana Corp (ECA.TO) and U.S. oil giant ConocoPhillips (COP.N) have closed their deal to create an integrated assets unit, Encana said on Wednesday. The agreement, first announced in October, will generate pre-tax cash flow in the range of $550 million to $650 million net to Encana, the company said in a press release.
story.title: encana and conocophillips close joint asset deal
